title: (x) Appear News" sans caps - Base Nine {Mike Y}
content:
any takers?

tiny image, but it's pretty distinctive...those A and W forms should make it IDable

thanks in advance typophilers!

g

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018024001im_/http:/typophile.com/files/newstranche_01_5689.gif)
author: geraintf

comments.content:
I think this is Emigre [Base 9](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018024001/http:/redesign.emigre.com/fontpage.php?PBasB.html), but in an older version, with a different W. It shows the W like your sample in the old print catalog I have, even though the web site apparently shows a redesigned version of the font.

- Mike Yanega
That W gives the whole thing a nice Deco feel.

My bad -- I think it is really the regular [Base Nine Small Caps](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018024001/http:/redesign.emigre.com/fontpage.php?PBasR.html), not the Bold.

- Mike Yanega

hey thanks mike!

a typically rapid response..

geraint
